page.title: 08MRS POTTER OF HOLT
page.content: {WHAT MRS POOTER OWNS Mrs Potter has twelve sheep, Fifty fresian cows, four chickens, five goats and one bull. Altogether she has seventy-one animals. She has fifty acres of land and three full-time workers. {IN THE MORNING Early in the morning Mrs Potter has to get up and milk her cows. Then she goes on an early morning milk round with her untreated milk. {WHERE MRS POTTER USED TO LIVE She used to live in a house attached to the farm buildings, but now she lives in a modern house. It is about fifteen metres away. She now uses her old house for store house. She prefers the modern house to the old one.
